en.title: Dream Big, Work Hard, Stay Humble.
en.subtitle: ——Be Versatile, Be Great.
en.about_text1: Hi there! Here is Zhe Xu, you can call me Joshua as well. I am a second-year master’s student in School of Computer Science at Fudan University, advised by Prof.Xipeng Qiu. My research interests focus on embodied AI, particularly exploring the intersection of foundation models and robotics. Previously, I obtained my Bachelor’s degree from Tongji University, and spent an unforgettable year and a half as a research assistant intern at MARS Lab, Tsinghua IIIS and Shanghai QiZhi Institute during my undergraduate studies, advised by Prof.Hang Zhao.
en.about_text2: Personally, I am dedicated to addressing truly meaningful research problems, and I tend to focus on work that aligns with first principles. The most fundamental issues I currently believe in are Scaling and Search. Feel free to contact me anytime if you share the same passion for these problems.

zh.title: 梦想远大，努力工作，保持谦逊。
zh.subtitle: ——多才多艺，成就伟大。
zh.about_text1: 你好！我是徐哲，你也可以叫我 Joshua。我是复旦大学计算机学院二年级硕士生，导师是邱锡鹏教授。我的研究兴趣聚焦于具身 AI，特别是探索基础模型与机器人的交集。之前，我从同济大学获得学士学位，并在本科期间在MARS 实验室、清华大学交叉信息研究院和上海奇智研究院担任研究助理实习生一年半，导师是赵行教授。
zh.about_text2: 个人而言，我致力于解决真正有意义的研究问题，并倾向于关注符合第一性原理的工作。我目前相信的最基本问题是Scaling 和 Search。如果您对这些问题有相同的热情，随时联系我。
